org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel

Class ViewModelCollection<T extends ViewModel>

  • java.lang.Object
    • <any>
      • org.dbasu.robomvvm.viewmodel.ViewModelCollection<T>

  • public class ViewModelCollection<T extends ViewModel>
extends <any>
    A collection of ViewModels. Can be used as an array adapter in adapter views. Has an event source Component to notify listeners of changing item checked states using ItemCheckedEventArg.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ViewModelCollection(Context context)
      Construct a ViewModelCollection with a supplied context using an internal list of view models as a backing store.
      ViewModelCollection(Context context, java.util.List<T> objects)
      Construct a ViewModelCollection with a supplied context using a supplied list of view models as a backing store.

        Returns:

      • removeCheckedItem

        public boolean removeCheckedItem(int position)
        Remove the item at the given position from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        position - The item position.
        Returns:
        True if the item at the given position was checked. False otherwise.

      • removeCheckedItems

        public boolean removeCheckedItems(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> positions)
        Remove all the the items at positions given by a collection from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        positions - A collection representing the positions of the checked items to remove.
        Returns:
        True is any of the items given by the positions collection were checked. False otherwise.

      • removeCheckedItems

        public boolean removeCheckedItems(int... positions)
        Remove all the the items at positions given by the argument list from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        positions - The positions of the checked items to remove.
        Returns:
        True is any of the items given by the positions were checked. False otherwise.

      • setCheckedItem

        public void setCheckedItem(int position)
        Set the item at a give position as the only checked item. Remove any items that were previously checked from the list of checked items.
        Parameters:
        position - The item position.
